column4: Problem: I just upgraded to 7.04. And I am using a ATI Radeon 9800 Pro. When I start up gnome things are totaly laggy and strange, and beryl resulted in 100% white screen (configured for AIGLX DRI). This sounds familiar?
check out beryl help pages...that's not ubuntu specific issue
oki.. so the ati open source drivers was updated as well?
